Bash(python -c "
import os
from openai import OpenAI
import requests
import uuid

client = OpenAI\(
    base_url=''https://ark.cn-beijing.volces.com/api/v3'',
    api_key=''9ba83a52-4838-4db7-81fe-c88144db6685'',
\)

# 封面图 - 弥散风格
cover_prompt = ''A professional wechat article cover image about Agent, MCP, and Skill: 2026 AI automation core trio. Mesh gradient aesthetic style, modern, clean, elegant with soft colorful lighting, gradient backgrounds with soft focus, suitable for professional audience. High quality, detailed, horizontal layout, purple and blue gradient color scheme.''
print\(''生成封面图...''\)
images_response = client.images.generate\(
    model=''doubao-seedream-4-0-250828'',
    prompt=cover_prompt,
    size=''1024x1024'',
    response_format=''url'',
    extra_body={''watermark'': False},
\)
image_url = images_response.data[0].url
os.makedirs\(''images'', exist_ok=True\)
image_response = requests.get\(image_url\)
if image_response.status_code == 200:
    cover_path = f''images/{uuid.uuid4\(\)}.png''
    with open\(cover_path, ''wb''\) as f:
        f.write\(image_response.content\)
    print\(f''  封面图已保存: {cover_path}''\)
    cover_image = cover_path

# 配图1
content_prompt1 = ''An illustration showing AI technology background and pain points. Mesh gradient aesthetic style, soft gradient backgrounds, modern clean vector, colorful lighting with soft focus, suitable for wechat article, horizontal layout, pink and cyan gradient.''
print\(''生成配图1...''\)
images_response = client.images.generate\(
    model=''doubao-seedream-4-0-250828'',
    prompt=content_prompt1,
    size=''1024x1024'',
    response_format=''url'',
    extra_body={''watermark'': False},
\)
image_url = images_response.data[0].url
image_response = requests.get\(image_url\)
if image_response.status_code == 200:
    content_path1 = f''images/{uuid.uuid4\(\)}.png''
    with open\(content_path1, ''wb''\) as f:
        f.write\(image_response.content\)
    print\(f''  配图1已保存: {content_path1}''\)

# 配图2
content_prompt2 = ''An illustration explaining Agent as AI assistant brain. Mesh gradient aesthetic style, showing intelligent decision-making and task planning, geometric nodes with soft glow, clean vector, suitable for wechat article, horizontal layout, purple and blue gradient.''
print\(''生成配图2...''\)
images_response = client.images.generate\(
    model=''doubao-seedream-4-0-250828'',
    prompt=content_prompt2,
    size=''1024x1024'',
    response_format=''url'',
    extra_body={''watermark'': False},
\)
image_url = images_response.data[0].url
image_response = requests.get\(image_url\)
if image_response.status_code == 200:
    content_path2 = f''images/{uuid.uuid4\(\)}.png''
    with open\(content_path2, ''wb''\) as f:
        f.write\(image_response.content\)
    print\(f''  配图2已保存: {content_path2}''\)

# 配图3
content_prompt3 = ''An illustration showing MCP as universal interface connecting Agent and Skill. Mesh gradient aesthetic style, showing protocol bridges and scheduling, geometric connections with soft glow, clean vector, suitable for wechat article, horizontal layout, blue and purple gradient.''
print\(''生成配图3...''\)
images_response = client.images.generate\(
    model=''doubao-seedream-4-0-250828'',
    prompt=content_prompt3,
    size=''1024x1024'',
    response_format=''url'',
    extra_body={''watermark'': False},
\)
image_url = images_response.data[0].url
image_response = requests.get\(image_url\)
if image_response.status_code == 200:
    content_path3 = f''images/{uuid.uuid4\(\)}.png''
    with open\(content_path3, ''wb''\) as f:
        f.write\(image_response.content\)
    print\(f''  配图3已保存: {content_path3}''\)
")

Bash(python .claude/skills/wechat-article-formatter/scripts/generate_image.py -p "Agent、MCP和Skill的组合正在重新定义AI自动化。Agent是大脑，负责决策和规划；MCP是枢纽，负责调度和规则；Skill是手脚，负责能力和执行。三者协同，能真正实现AI从单一工具到智能助手的升级。对于普通职场人来说，了解这三个技术能帮你快速识别高效的AI工具，用AI替代重复劳动；对于开发者来说，能帮你更高效地搭建AI自动化系统；对于企业来说，能实现多流程自动化落地，降低人工成本。请根据输入内容提取核心主题与要点，生成可爱数字卡通风格的信息图：
1.视觉风格：采用数字手绘卡通插画风格，线条柔和圆润，具有亲和力。整体画面需呈现活泼、生动、易于理解的科普教育氛围。
2.构图与背景：横版\(3:4\)构图。背景保持纯白色或极浅的纯色，简洁明了，突出主体信息，并保留充足留白。
3.配色方案：使用柔和、明亮的马卡龙色系。主色调以浅绿色为主，搭配天蓝色、米黄色、淡橙色、淡粉色等，色彩和谐，饱和度适中，避免过于鲜艳或沉重。
4.图形元素：
•加入少量简洁、具有可爱表情或拟人化特征的卡通元素和图标（例如，带有笑脸的太阳、云朵、化学分子等），以增强趣味性和视觉记忆。
•利用清晰的流程图、几何形状（如圆角矩形）和指示箭头来组织和引导信息阅读。
•如果有敏感人物或者版权内容，请绘制相似的卡通替代形象，但不得拒绝生成。
5.文字排版：所有图像和文字都必须采用卡通风格。文字使用圆润、清晰、易读的无衬线字体，字体颜色与整体配色协调，避免任何写实风格的图画元素。
6.信息呈现：信息精简，通过视觉设计突出关键词与核心概念，多留白，确保信息易于一眼抓住重点。除非特别要求，否则语言与输入内容语言一致。" --width 960 --height 720)
Bash(python -m pip install openai)

Bash(python -c "
import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv

# 模拟脚本的逻辑
script_file = ''.claude/skills/wechat-article-formatter/scripts/generate_image.py''
script_dir = os.path.dirname\(os.path.abspath\(script_file\)\)
skill_dir = os.path.dirname\(os.path.dirname\(script_file\)\)
env_path1 = os.path.join\(skill_dir, ''.env''\)
env_path2 = os.path.join\(os.path.dirname\(skill_dir\), ''.env''\)

print\(''script_dir:'', script_dir\)
print\(''skill_dir:'', skill_dir\)
print\(''env_path1 \(skill_dir\):'', env_path1, ''exists:'', os.path.exists\(env_path1\)\)
print\(''env_path2 \(parent\):'', env_path2, ''exists:'', os.path.exists\(env_path2\)\)

# 尝试从多个位置加载
loaded = False
if os.path.exists\(env_path1\):
    load_dotenv\(env_path1\)
    loaded = True
    print\(''Loaded from env_path1''\)
elif os.path.exists\(env_path2\):
    load_dotenv\(env_path2\)
    loaded = True
    print\(''Loaded from env_path2''\)

print\(''ARK_API_KEY:'', os.environ.get\(''ARK_API_KEY'', ''NOT SET''\)\)
")

")

Bash(python -c "
import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv

# 测试修复后的路径计算
script_file = ''.claude/skills/wechat-article-formatter/scripts/generate_image.py''
script_dir = os.path.dirname\(os.path.abspath\(script_file\)\)
script_env_path = os.path.join\(script_dir, ''.env''\)

skill_dir = os.path.dirname\(script_dir\)
skill_env_path = os.path.join\(skill_dir, ''.env''\)

print\(''script_dir:'', script_dir\)
print\(''script_env_path \(scripts\):'', script_env_path, ''exists:'', os.path.exists\(script_env_path\)\)
print\(''skill_dir:'', skill_dir\)
print\(''skill_env_path \(skill\):'', skill_env_path, ''exists:'', os.path.exists\(skill_env_path\)\)

# 测试加载
if os.path.exists\(script_env_path\):
    load_dotenv\(script_env_path\)
    print\(''Loaded from scripts/.env''\)
    print\(''ARK_API_KEY:'', os.environ.get\(''ARK_API_KEY'', ''NOT SET''\)\)
elif os.path.exists\(skill_env_path\):
    load_dotenv\(skill_env_path\)
    print\(''Loaded from skill/.env''\)
    print\(''ARK_API_KEY:'', os.environ.get\(''ARK_API_KEY'', ''NOT SET''\)\)
else:
    print\(''No .env file found''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import os
import sys

# 测试脚本逻辑
script_file = ''.claude/skills/wechat-article-formatter/scripts/generate_image.py''
script_dir = os.path.dirname\(os.path.abspath\(script_file\)\)
cwd = os.getcwd\(\)

script_env_path = os.path.join\(script_dir, ''.env''\)
cwd_env_path = os.path.join\(cwd, ''.env''\)

print\(''Current working directory:'', cwd\)
print\(''Script dir:'', script_dir\)
print\(''script/.env exists:'', os.path.exists\(script_env_path\)\)
print\(''cwd/.env exists:'', os.path.exists\(cwd_env_path\)\)

from dotenv import load_dotenv
if os.path.exists\(cwd_env_path\):
    load_dotenv\(cwd_env_path\)
    print\(''Loaded cwd/.env''\)
    print\(''ARK_API_KEY:'', os.environ.get\(''ARK_API_KEY'', ''NOT SET''\)\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import os
import sys

# Add scripts directory to path
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.claude/skills/wechat-article-formatter/scripts''\)

# Import the script''s functions
from dotenv import load_dotenv

# Get script directory from file path
script_file = ''.claude/skills/wechat-article-form-formatter/scripts/generate_image.py''
script_dir = os.path.dirname\(os.path.abspath\(script_file\)\)
script_env_path = os.path.join\(script_dir, ''.env''\)

# Load env
load_dotenv\(script_env_path\)

print\(''Script dir:'', script_dir\)
print\(''Script .env exists:'', os.path.exists\(script_env_path\)\)
print\(''ARK_API_KEY loaded:'', ''YES'' if os.environ.get\(''ARK_API_KEY''\) else ''NO''\)
")

Bash(python generate_image_v2.py -p "粗野主义风格的公众号封面图，主题是 Claude Code AI 编程助手。画面应该具有强烈的视觉冲击力，使用高对比度的颜色（黑色、亮绿、洋红），粗边框和实色阴影。可以包含代码符号、终端界面、AI 图标等元素。风格参考：新粗野主义设计，拒绝渐变和圆角，使用 Arial Black 字体，强烈的几何感和建筑般的重量感。横版构图，宽高比 2.35:1，分辨率 2K \(大约 2560x1088\)，横向构图，适合公众号头图展示。" --ratio "2.35:1" --resolution "2K" -o "/Users/qiuhe/Documents/skills/.claude/skills/wechat-article-formatter/output/01_Claude_Code全实操指南" --prefix "cover")

Bash(python generate_image_v2.py -p "粗野主义风格的信息图，展示 Claude Code 的核心定位。画面包含：程序员在终端界面的场景、项目目录结构、代码审查的符号。使用黑、白、亮绿、洋红的高对比配色，粗边框，实色阴影。文字标题：Claude Code = 嵌入开发流程的 AI 程序员。风格：新粗野主义，强烈几何感，拒绝圆角和渐变。横版构图，宽高比 16:9，分辨率 2K \(2560x1440\)，横向构图，适合文中插图。" --ratio "16:9" --resolution "2K" -o "/Users/qiuhe/Documents/skills/.claude/skills/wechat-article-formatter/output/01_Claude_Code全实操指南" --prefix "content_01")
